alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: Snow will continue to move in from the north before 700 PM. This will be light but occasionally moderate to heavy in intensity. While temperatures are limiting the snowfall accumulations, they will cool a few degrees with any heavier snowfall allowing for more surfaces to accumulate snow. Any snow accumulations are expected to remain light, near 1 inch or less, mainly on the grassy surfaces. Visibilities will be lowered down to near a half to 1 mile with the snowfall. Motorists should proceed with caution and drive extra slowly especially if there is any snow on the road as this would make for slippery conditions.
